description: Source files for the AppGateway plugin in the WPEFramework project, including implementation and responder classes, as well as core components like Resolver and Module.

classes.name: AppGateway
classes.description: Main class handling the AppGateway plugin logic, potentially managing communication with other components.

classes.description: Implementation class for the AppGateway plugin functionalities.

classes.name: AppGatewayResponderImplementation
classes.description: Responder class implementing specific response handling in the AppGateway plugin.

classes.name: Resolver
classes.description: Core utility class involved in resolving dependencies or configurations within the plugin.

classes.name: Module
classes.description: Module class related to plugin initialization and lifecycle management.
